ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: I have only been playing for a year. I would not feel guilty about consolidating my items and money to one character. I quite often transfer funds and items
ygData.messageBody:
I have only been playing for a year. I would not
feel guilty about consolidating my items and money to
one character. I quite often transfer funds and items
between them as it is. I see my characters as a group of
friends who give/loan stuff to each other. Now granted,
I'm not a single digit level toon running around in
plane gear, but my bard does have 3 pieces of lambent
and she's just 21. <br>To me, minor twinking (fs
weapon, something not outrageous) is ok. Think of it as
friends looking out for each other. However, level 3
bards with full lambentor singing steel (I have seen
them!) running for their lives from orc pawns are
ridiculous. I've had level 3 warriors with wurmslayers and
better gear than my 25th warrior asking me for stuff. I
had one guy trying to impress me with the fact that
he had spent 13k for a robe for his level 6 caster.
A fool and his money..... My rambling is now over.
Sorry for any stress it causes!<br><br>Kei<br>Frehley,
Maeter on Brell<br>Emereldas, Keiyuki, Keiyuri on Rathe
